• Places to find free media – Audio, images and more. all under the creative common license.
  • Acts as Git – git like way to keep versioning of a model.
  • FIELDSET and LEGEND.. the lost sons – using these tags to group HTML and form elements.
  • “ErlangFactory presentation”: http://www.slideshare.net/ezmobius/erlangfactory?type=powerpoint – a useful presentation for a change.
  • MySQL conference presentations – quick! before Oracle finds out about it. :)
  • RDOC.info – a mini-app to gather fresh documentation from GitHub hosted ruby/rails projects.
  • JQuery plugins for table manipulations – Color, Sorting, Selecting…
